org.jasr.currentcy.controller

Class AppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasr.currentcy.controller.AppController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/config")
public class AppController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the app server side controller. It handles all REST requests from the mobile app, pertaining samples, snapshots and exchange notifications. This controller is a Rest Controller and is Swagger-annotated.

      AppController()

      Returns information for an exchange.
      Trend samples(java.lang.String source, Currencies currency)
      Returns a series of the latest samples taken for the given exchange.
      java.util.List<Sample> snapshot(Currencies currency)
      Returns the latest samples taken for each exchange from which changes are detected since the last sampling.

      • config

        @RequestMapping(value="/app",
                method=GET)
public AppConfig config(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns configuration information for the app.
        Parameters:
        code - the code of the exchange
        Returns:
        the SamplerBase corresponding to the exchange identified by the code parameter

      • exchange

        @RequestMapping(value="/exchange",
                method=GET)
public SamplerBase exchange(@RequestParam
                                                                                             java.lang.String code)
        Returns information for an exchange.
        Parameters:
        code - the code of the exchange
        Returns:
        the SamplerBase corresponding to the exchange identified by the code parameter

      • snapshot

        @RequestMapping(value="/snapshot",
                method=GET)
public java.util.List<Sample> snapshot(@RequestParam
                                                                                                        Currencies currency)
        Returns the latest samples taken for each exchange from which changes are detected since the last sampling.
        Parameters:
        currency - the currency on which the snapshot is taken
        Returns:
        list of latest samples for each of the exchanges with differences

      • samples

        @RequestMapping(value="/{source}/samples",
                method=GET)
public Trend samples(@PathVariable
                                                                                              java.lang.String source,
                                                                                              @RequestParam
                                                                                              Currencies currency)
        Returns a series of the latest samples taken for the given exchange.
        Parameters:
        source - the exchange from which the sample is taken
        currency - The currency on which the sample is expressed
        Returns:
        A trend object containing the latest samples for the selected exchange
